long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embed any twitch chat into any website - show and hide with click of button. Position it, resize it, change its opacity. The main use case is embedding twitch chat next an alternative stream (lol esports, youtube, etc...) so you can still get twitch chat without using the popout feature.
